boardgame.name: 07 zgłoś się
P.I.
boardgame.description: P.I. is a pure deduction game, with players competing in three consecutive mini-games in order to see who's got the best chops in terms of solving their cases._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each mini-game plays out the same way. To start, you receive in secret one suspect card (out of 12), one crime card (out of 10), and one location card (out of 14); this set of information represents the case that the player to your left must solve. The game board shows fourteen locations arranged so that each location touches a few others; each location has space for a suspect and crime tile. Shuffle the suspect tiles (12, plus two _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;no suspect_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) and the crime tiles (10, plus four _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;no crime_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;), then place one face up in each location. Each suspect, crime and location is included in a deck of evidence cards, and nine evidence cards are revealed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On a turn, a player either places an investigator, chooses an evidence card, or attempts to solve her case. When you place an investigator in a location, the player to your right looks at his case cards, then places a disc on this space for each case card he holds that matches the suspect, crime or location in this space. Additionally, he places a cube on this space for each suspect, crime or location that's adjacent to this space._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When you choose an evidence card, the player to your right places a disc on the matching tile if the card matches one of the case cards he holds, places a cube on the matching tile if this tile is adjacent to a tile matching one of the case cards he holds, or places nothing if you've made a wild-eyed guess and the tile isn't adjacent to anything._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To attempt to solve the case, you place a black token on your guesses. If wrong, you're penalized two points and continue play next turn. If right, you receive 7, 5, 3 or 1 points depending on how many others have solved their cases in earlier rounds._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The mini-game ends once everyone has solved their case or only one case remains unsolved. All used investigators are removed from play, then the board and cards are reset for the next mini-case. Each player has only five investigators total, so use them wisely!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Whoever has the most points after three mini-cases wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Signed by Martin Wallance. Hence, not in shrink. Unpunched and unplayed, in pristine condition. Within the US, I ship via Fedex, with insurance and tracking (shipping to an office location should cost around $11). Outside the US, I will ship via USPS, probably the easiest to use. I will charge the exact amount I pay for shipping, no extras. Check out my other games for sale. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to combine shipping.

ASMODEE (ASMPI01US) Can you stay ahead of your competitors to solve the crime? Prove your detective skills in three mini games. In each round, investigators try to solve different case that the player to your left must solve by discovering the suspect, the crime and where the suspect is hiding. The crimes take place in notorious locations like Skid Row, Trocadero, Little Italy, etc... You must work diligently to solve your cases before the other investigators as you will gain bonus points for your good work, however, if you are wrong, you will be penalized!

ASMODEE (ASMPI01US)
Can you stay ahead of your competitors to solve the crime? Prove your detective skills in three mini games. The crimes take place in notorious locations like Skid Row, Trocadero, Little Italy, etc... You must work diligently to solve your cases before the other investigators as you will gain bonus points for your good work, however, if you are wrong, you will be penalized!
